price: Hakika Qur'ani hii inawasimulia Wana wa Israili mengi wanayo khitalifiana nayo.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلَّذِي هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
footnotes: Hakika Kitabu hiki alicho teremshiwa Muhammad kinawawekea wazi Wana wa Israili ukweli wa yaliyo kuja katika Taurati, katika mambo ya itikadi na hukumu na hadithi. Na kinawarudisha kwenye kweli katika mambo waliyo khitalifiana kwayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā al-qur'āna yaquṣṣu ʿalā banī is'rāīla akthara alladhī hum fīhi yakhtalifūna
